about_the_game:
Interactive narrative gameplay: explore mysterious environments, interact with objects and converse with characters with murky intentions.

Discover puzzles and mini-games: use your powers to manipulate your environment and unlock new possibilities.

Impactful choices: choose your answers, and your decisions will influence the story, leading to several possible endings.

Supernatural abilities: perceive invisible elements and interact with unreachable objects to progress.

An immersive atmosphere: unique art direction and an original soundtrack to add to the mystery.

You play as Elie, a young man who is a little too innocent...

The world you live in doesn't seem to pose any particular problems. But it seems you're not alone...

Some people from elsewhere seem to need your help!

So, motivated by your good intentions, you want to help them.

Unfortunately, the people who have contacted you may not be as well-intentioned as they claim...

Is it too late? Have you fallen into a trap? Is there still time to turn back? What choice do you have?
